fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection

Class DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractPort
      • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
        • fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection.DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, DynamicConnectionRequestI, OutboundPortI, PortI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort
extends AbstractOutboundPort
implements DynamicConnectionRequestI
    The class DynamicConnectionOutboundPort implements the client side port used to request and establish dynamic connections among components.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2013-01-23

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
